Comments_List: Learned in general about cosmology; gained some understanding of what terms in cosmology mean.
I developed a general picture about cosmology history and some physical understanding of cosmological processes.

The course was very general, which I see as both a strength and a weakness: didn't learn anything very in-depth, but covered a variety of topics. Not much focus on what is happening in current research.
Strengths: this course provides a comprehensive survey to important topics of cosmology.
Yes. One would get a clear general picture of cosmology from this course.
